sentences.english: They sought out potters who had once made copies of the ancient vessels.
sentences.chinese: 他们寻找曾经仿制过古代器皿的陶工。

sentences.english: Marcella says that God is the potter molding the clay.
sentences.chinese: 玛塞拉说上帝是一位塑造陶土的陶工。

sentences.english: The potter understood that donkey was a bonded donkey.
sentences.chinese: 陶工明白了，这头驴是一头被束缚的驴。

sentences.english: The potter carefully shaped the vase.
sentences.chinese: 那个陶工精心地制作了这个花瓶。

sentences.english: The potters did as he asked.
sentences.chinese: 陶工们按照他说的话做了。

sentences.english: Luckily, the potter saw the wise saint again.
sentences.chinese: 侥幸的是，陶工又看到了那位睿智的圣人。

sentences.english: As early as the Yongle reign of the Ming dynasty, Jingdezhen potters tried the making of architectural ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 明代永乐时期，景德镇陶工就进行了建筑陶瓷的尝试。

sentences.english: The king got very angry. He ordered his best potters to mend the bowl.
sentences.chinese: 国王大怒，他命令最好的陶工来给他补碗。

sentences.english: The potter did what the saint had said.
sentences.chinese: 陶工按照圣人说的做了。

sentences.english: Remove a teapot lid lip with tips from a master potter in this free ceramics video.
sentences.chinese: 消除这视频免费陶瓷与技巧从主陶工茶壶盖唇。

sentences.english: A potter makes a pot, which breaks to pieces again.
sentences.chinese: 一个陶工铸造了陶器，又被打成了碎片。

sentences.english: Some of this was influenced by Chinese potters.
sentences.chinese: 这其中受到了中国陶工的影响。

sentences.english: And they gave them unto the potter's field, as the Lord appointed to me.
sentences.chinese: 用这钱买了陶工的那块田，如上主所吩咐我的。

definition: to make ceramics (on a potter's wheel)
Everton (town in northwest England)/Everton soccer team
